roleset.name: meet with

example.name: Tricky, but meeting with people rather than seeing a place.
example.text: Many are far enough from residential areas to pass public muster, yet close enough to permit family visits.

example.name: Common
example.text: During his visit with Barack Obama,

roleset.note: Added due to nombank additions. VN class meet-36.3-1. Comparison with visit.01. No VN class. Created by Katie.

roleset.name: see

example.name: Both args
example.text: On the fourth day of his visit to China,

example.name: With arg ms
example.text: a three-day official visit to Helsinki
Now he is mounting the steps of a stucco building in a nearby village, on a visit to the Communist administrator, the "naczelnik"

roleset.note: Added due to expansion of nombank. No VN class. FN classes visiting and arriving.

predicate.note: It may occasionally be hard to distinguish between .01 and .02. Visit.01 involved a meeting with other people, visit.02 involves a trip to see a place or the trip to potentially see other people. Visit.02 will stress the trip while visit.01 should almost always mention the other party.
